title: Rugby Challenge 2-FLT
description:
In Their 26th Year Of Glory, FairLight Released #1105

Rugby Challenge 2 (c) Sidhe Interactive

:  Supplied by: FAIRLIGHT            : : Release Date: 24/07/2013
Cracked by:  FAIRLIGHT              Game Type:    Sport
Packaged by: FAIRLIGHT              Image Format: ISO
-----
DISCS: 1 DVD                        Protection: Steam

System Requirements : (S)-1-phenylpropan-2-amine

Game information
=================

Immerse your senses in the greatest rugby game ever,  Rugby  Challenge  2
Rugby Challenge, with the legendary Jonah Lomu  still  at  the  helm,  has
evolved and boasts a plethora of new content

Rugby Challenge 2 features 110 teams and 50 stadia from around the world
including licenses for the All Blacks, the Qantas Wallabies,  British  and
Irish Lions 2013  Tour  of  Australia,  the  USA  Eagles,  Bledisloe  Cup,
Barbarians FC, Combined Country,  Super  Rugby  teams,  AVIVA  Premiership
Rugby, TOP 14, Pro D2, RaboDirect PRO12, ITM Cup, and the Ranfurly Shield

Refined and expanded gameplay with  the  addition  of  quick  taps,  quick
lineouts, mauls from  lineouts,  interceptions,  contesting  ball  at  the
breakdown, removing players from the ruck, number  8  scrum  pickups,  and
dynamic in-game team strategies

Game modes including  Single  Match,  The  Lions  Tour,  Competitions,  an
expanded multi-year Career Mode, Tutorials, and Online play with up to 4v4
multiplayer
Gamers can expect revamped sound and commentary  systems,  with  real-time
commentary from Grant Nisbett and former All Black Justin Marshall,  along
with French language  commentary  from  Eric  Bayle  and  Thomas  Lombard

It also offers more options to create or  customise  players,  teams,  and
competitions, to change game rules and behaviour so the game plays the way
you want it to

Installation Information
=========================

Burn or mount
Install
Play the game

NOTE: As usual, block the game exe in your firewall


System Requirements:

Minimum:
OS:Windows XP/Vista/7/8
Processor:Intel 2.2 GHz Dual-Core or AMD 2.5 GHz Dual-Core
Memory:2 GB RAM
Graphics:GeForce 8800 (512 MB) or Radeon HD3850 (512 MB)
DirectX:9.0c
Hard Drive:6 GB HD space
Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
Additional:Compatible with Direct Input keyboards and controllers

Recommended:
OS:Windows XP/Vista/7/8
Processor:Intel or AMD Quad-Core
Memory:3 GB RAM
Graphics:GeForce 260 (1 GB) or Radeon HD 4850 (1 GB)
DirectX:9.0c
Hard Drive:6 GB HD space
Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
Additional:Compatible with Direct Input keyboards and controllers
